definitions: a person who presents a petition to an authority in respect of a particular cause

examples.text: petitioners gathered about 70,000 signatures for the initiative

shortDefinitions: person who presents petition to authority in respect of particular cause

definitions: a person who makes a formal application to a court for a writ, judicial action in a suit, etc.

examples.text: the claim by the petitioner for spousal support is dismissed

shortDefinitions: person who makes formal application to court for writ, judicial action in suit
